title: Vampires Rule
description: They don't call him Jackpot for nothing.Seventeen-year-old Jack Creed has always beat the odds... at least until now. When a werewolf tried to kill him, vampires saved him. When he got tired of life as a vampire, another attack made him mortal. Now Jack just wants to live a normal life, but what's normal about a hunter-girlfriend, a brother who wants to stake him to be on the safe side, and a homicidal werewolf building an army to rule the world?
author: K.C. Blake
